about_the_game:
In the demo version you will only play on 2 maps, there will be only basic weapons and no zombie mode.

WARRIORS is a first-person shooter designed for both multiplayer action and single-player experiences with AI bots. Our mission is to fill a gap in the VR shooter market by offering a straightforward, accessible game with stunning graphics and smooth, immersive gameplay.

Inspired by the best FPS titles, Warzone VR offers a range of game modes and maps—whether you prefer intense, close-quarters combat in smaller arenas or more strategic battles in larger environments. With seamless multiplayer functionality, varied weapon loadouts, and AI bots for offline practice, the game delivers fast, responsive action without unnecessary complexity.

This game is built for players looking for a refined VR shooter experience that combines the excitement of competitive gameplay with well-balanced mechanics. Whether you're jumping into a quick firefight or organizing with friends for larger operations, WARRIORS offers thrilling combat, outstanding visuals, and plenty of replay value.

name: WARRIORS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600k | Ryzen 5-3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR

short_description: WARRIORS is a shooter that offers both multiplayer action and a single-player experience with AI bots. Our aim is to fill a gap we believe exists in the VR shooter market by providing a simple, no-frills game with exceptional graphics and gameplay. Inspired by 3 best shooters.
